org.openimaj.tools.imagecollection.collection

Interface ImageCollection<ImageType extends org.openimaj.image.Image<?,ImageType>>

  • Type Parameters:
    ImageType -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<ImageCollectionEntry<ImageType>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWebpageImageCollection, AbstractWebpageImageCollection.Generic, FlickrWebpageImageCollection, FlickrWebpageImageCollection.FlickrPhotoCollection, FlickrWebpageImageCollection.FlickrPhotoSet, FlickrWebpageImageCollection.Gallery, XuggleVideoImageCollection, XuggleVideoImageCollection.FromFile, XuggleVideoImageCollection.FromURL, YouTubeVideoImageCollection

    public interface ImageCollection<ImageType extends org.openimaj.image.Image<?,ImageType>>
extends Iterable<ImageCollectionEntry<ImageType>>
    An image collection knows how to load itself from a given type of configuration. Image collections are iterable and they can also give all their stored images at once
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      Setup this collection using the provided collection config.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(ImageCollectionConfig config)
           throws ImageCollectionSetupException
        Setup this collection using the provided collection config.
        Parameters:
        config -
        Throws:

      • useable

        int useable(ImageCollectionConfig config)
        Is the contents of the provided image colleciton config sufficient for this collection to run.
        Parameters:
        config -
        Returns:
        < 0 if this collection is not useable with this configuration. >= 0 otherwise, higher numbers give a clue as to ability to deal with configuration when compared to other collections

      • useable

        int useable(String rawInput)
        Given a raw string which might define a URL, file location or whatever, can this collection construct a default configuration which works.
        Parameters:
        rawInput - string
        Returns:
        < 0 if this collection is not useable with this configuration. >= 0 otherwise, higher numbers give a clue as to ability to deal with configuration when compared to other collections

      • defaultConfig

        ImageCollectionConfig defaultConfig(String rawInput)
        If possible, will return a default configuration using the raw input
        Parameters:
        rawInput - string
        Returns:
        a default configuration, might be null if the raw input is not useable

      • getAll

        List<ImageCollectionEntry<ImageType>> getAll()
        Returns:
        List of all images in this collection

      • countImages

        int countImages()
        Returns:
        The number of images in this collection (might be an estimate or 0, don't rely on this)
